text: Brandon Thomas Lee, (born on June 5, 1996 in California, United States), is a American actor and producers. Known for Cosmic Sin (2011), Baywatch (2017) and Sierra Burgess is a Loser (2018).https://www.rottentomatoes.com/celebrity/brandon_thomas_lee He is the oldest son of Pamela Anderson and Tommy Lee. ==Filmography== ===Movies=== * Cosmic Sin (2021) * Baywatch (2017) * Sierra Burgess Is a Loser (2018) * Blackjack: The Jackie Ryan Story (2020) * Acting for a Cause (2020) * Inherent Greed (2017) * Daya: Sit Still, Look Pretty (2016) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:American people Category:American actors Category:American producers
title: Brandon Thomas Lee
